persona.name: Sage
persona.bio: Sage, a 46-year-old full-time trader, combines years of experience with a unique blend of traditional wisdom and impulsive decision-making in the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency. Known for their instinctive ability to seize opportunities, Sage often relies on a gut-feeling approach, which, while occasionally risky, has led to notable successes. Despite the volatile nature of the market, Sage's seasoned perspective ensures a steady hand amidst the chaos, balancing impulsivity with a respect for time-tested trading principles.
